review: exposes the high profile life's of rich and poverty of  poor. one if the finest movie of bollywood. must watch, exellent acting by rajpal and kk menon.
a must watch movie. many things are praise worthy including kay kay's innocence portrayed in his character. an awesome movie with a message.
a must watch..wonderful movie..great work by talented kay kay menon and raj pal yadav..a good piece of art created by younus sajawal..
watched today only, one of the most underrated movies. kay kay and rajpal yadav at their best.
underrated movie. exposes the evils prevailing in high society and the helplessness of the bar girls who have been falsely stigmatized by our society.
i watched this movie yesterday.it was really a good movie.dont know why it failed in box office.the movie is entertaining and shows so much reality.
this kind of movies deserve 10 out of 10 but i don't know why imdb has given only 6.1 ratings for this movie.
